content: Hello! I'm an incoming PhD student at Scripps Institution of Oceanography, and I'm working with @Yassir Eddebbar on analyzing CESM data this summer, looking at oxygen in the tropical Pacific. I'm interested in a whole bunch of things, but particularly large-scale ocean circulation, ocean-climate interactions, and climate change. Excited to be here, because I'm sure I'll have a ton of questions. :wave:
Welcome! Yassir is wonderful to work with and we are glad you are here. Definitely ask away ;)
